name: Abandoned Mining Tunnel Interactive Scene
description:
This is a prototype of an interactable game scene inspired by the Diablo 4's art style.  

Controls are simple:

LEFT CLICK: Sends a shock wave that causes all the interactable objects in the scene to react. This is to simulate the effect of a ground-shaking skill casted by the player.

RIGHT CLICK: Restores all broken / shaken objects to its original state.

MIDDLE MOUSE BUTTON: Hides / unhides the UI hint that shows you the controls in game.
